text: The Hartford Hurricanes were an American basketball team based in Hartford, Connecticut that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team was previously known as the Elizabeth Braves who moved to Hartford during the 1947/48 season on December 19, 1947. ==References== Hurricanes Category:Defunct basketball teams in Connecticut Category:American Basketball League (1925–1955) teams Category:Basketball teams established in 1947 Category:Basketball teams disestablished in 1950
title: Hartford Hurricanes
